page.title: 18A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ALICIA.
page.content: My mum has to wake me up in the mornings at 8 o'clock.Then I have cocopops for breakfast.Mum takes me to school in her car.She leaves me at the lollipop man.When the bell goes I line up and the teacher lets us inside if we are quiet and still and the line is straight.We go to assembly and we sometimes have a story and a song. Afterwards we do handwriting then maths.After first play we finish our maths.Dinner is at 12.00.Today it was beefburgers and chips.We go out to play but some children go for violin lessons.In the afternoon we learn about worms and our teacher reads a story.Mum takes me home and I play until 6.00.We have tea and then I feed my rabbit,dog and hamster.Mum puts me to bed and I read five stories before I go to sleep.
